page.title: 08Summary of Industrial Estate
page.content: As can be seen from the employment figures there is an even spread of manpower throughout the five main groups and the industrial estate itself provides work for 1258 people.The estate has both local and national importance in terms of jobs and in the fact that there are several unique companies providing a service on a country wide basis. In the total there are 34 companies working on the estate and there are several new buildings still vacant and consequently room for more expansion.The estates position on the Leeds Ring Road and its proximity to the city itself are very attractive to potential developers.Indeed it appears that over the years the estate has changed considerably and many of the original companies are no longer on site.
